title: A Day in the Life – Max Sedlak
content:
From Crankbrothers: “Meet Max. A frequent Crankbrothers HQ visitor, co-owner of the famed Rut Track World Champs, golden Labrador enthusiast, and overall bike wizard. Follow along with the 20-something-year-old Orange County native to see what a day in his life is like, as he heads into the 2023 Enduro season, full steam ahead. Podiums only if you want the free coffee to continue, kid.”

Video: Jack Clark // @jackkclark

Photo: Jake Paddon // @jake.paddon

The post A Day in the Life – Max Sedlak appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
